Class ApplicationRepository

Object
ApplicationRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
IRepository<ProjectApplication,String>
public class ApplicationRepository extends Object implements IRepository<ProjectApplication,String>
This entity class is a repository for managing ProjectApplication entities.

    • findByApplicantNric

      public List<ProjectApplication> findByApplicantNric(String applicantNric)
      Finds all applications submitted by a specific applicant.
      Parameters:
      applicantNric - The NRIC of the applicant.
      Returns:
      List of applications submitted by the user.

    • findActiveApplicationByApplicantNric

      public Optional<ProjectApplication> findActiveApplicationByApplicantNric(String applicantNric)
      Finds an applicant's application that is NOT in a final state (Rejected, Withdrawn, potentially Booked depending on rules). Used to check the "cannot apply for multiple projects" rule[cite: 11].
      Parameters:
      applicantNric - The NRIC of the applicant.
      Returns:
      Optional containing the active/pending application if found, empty otherwise.

    • findByProjectId

      public List<ProjectApplication> findByProjectId(String projectId)
      Finds applications related to a specific project ID. Assumes ProjectApplication has a reference to the Project.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The unique ID (e.g., name) of the project.
      Returns:
      List of applications for that project.
